page.title: 12BREAKFAST SURVEY:PARKGATE
page.content:
On Thursday 18th April 1985 Class 6 did a{breakfast survey}with{34 {children}and found out that
2 people had a cooked breakfast {26}people had{cereal
10 people had brown bread toast 14 people had white bread toast 10 people had butter on their toast 10 people had margarine on their toast 5 people had jam with their toast
{22 people}had{sugar with}their{cereal or with their{tea or coffee
{15}people had a cup of{tea 4 people had a cup of coffee {12}people had a glass of{fruit juice 1 person had a glass of water { 4 people had no drink
